pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, April 25, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, April 25, 2016:

Kananaskis, Alberta

8:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet meeting.

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will take part in the Cabinet retreat family photo.

Delta Lodge at Kananaskis
Kananaskis, Alberta

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only

Please note: all times are local.

PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
